title: 820-3462 no wifi bluetooth SD card
message:
Arrived with no wifi, bluetooth or SD card, otherwise works perfect. Board and IO board are spotless with no liquid damage. Replaced IO board with a known good board for testing but no change.

What to check first?

title: 820-3462 no wifi bluetooth SD card
message:
All these perypheral are located on RIO board.
Inspect J4410 for corrosion, as RIO flex connectors too.
Try known good RIO flex/board.

Check R2686/88.

title: 820-3462 no wifi bluetooth SD card
message: Solved. Minor corrosion found in J4410
